mapper.select: SELECT /* */ REG_DATE AS regDate /* */ , TELEMSG_NO AS telemsgNo /* */ , RECEPT_INFO AS receptInfo /* */ , BANK_CODE AS bankCode /* */ , ACNUT_NO AS acnutNo /* */ , DELNG_AMOUNT AS delngAmount /* */ , DPSTR_NM AS dpstrNm /* */ , RSPNS_CODE AS rspnsCode /* */ , RSPNS_MSSAGE AS rspnsMssage /* */ , SEND_YN AS sendYn /* */ FROM T2000101 WHERE 1=1 AND REG_DATE = #{regDate} AND SEND_YN = #{sendYn}
